sections.headline: 30-Day ROI Guarantee
sections.description: If Senova doesn't deliver positive ROI within 30 days, we'll refund your first month and help you export your data.
terms: Valid for new customers on Professional plan or higher
Requires pixel installation and minimum 100 website visitors
Must complete onboarding within first week

questions.question: Are there any setup or installation fees?
questions.answer: No! Setup, onboarding, and installation are completely free for all plans. We even provide white-glove assistance.

questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my patient limit?
questions.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit and help you upgrade. We never cut off access to your data.

questions.question: Do you require annual contracts?
questions.answer: No contracts required! All plans are month-to-month, though we offer 20% off for annual prepayment.

questions.question: Is HIPAA compliance really included?
questions.answer: Yes! Full HIPAA compliance with signed BAA is included in every plan at no extra charge.

questions.question: How accurate is the visitor identification?
questions.answer: Our Professional plan identifies 80% of visitors with 95% accuracy. Starter plan identifies 30% of visitors.
